title: Ranked help pls
body: Tips for getting out of silver since every season i get put back in this hellhole with teams that are either smurfs or boosted retards, who the smurfs prey on to win easy games, whilst I cannot think of anything that someone hasnt already said in order to help my fucking cuck teammates from easy kills that they cant seem to capitalise on. Please tell me because I get some really really easy games, and then mediocre games. And i get loses with my really good games, and always a loss with medicore games, pls end my suffering.
